title: Can you help to find the font like this?
content:
Hello everybody.  
I want to find the type like on this website \> [http://www.isadoradesign.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317132517/http:/www.isadoradesign.com/), the name of the brand Isadora in the top left corner.  
Tnanks!
author: vitaliypos

comments.content:
Please do not post type ID requests here. The correct link for them is:  
 [http://typophile.com/typeid](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317132517/http:/typophile.com/typeid "http://typophile.com/typeid")
